title: Exquisite Floral Grand Haaram with Emerald Pendant and Pearl Accents
materials: Freshwater Pearls (Moti - 44.23ct for the necklace and 20.22ct for the locket). Features a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: The Haaram showcases an intricate floral design, meticulously crafted with delicate gold filigree work. Each flower is studded with sparkling rubies. The central pendant features a beautiful emerald, surrounded by a halo of shimmering gems and dangling pearls. The pendant connects to the floral necklace which contains a series of pearl droplets.
colors: Predominantly gold with the vibrant red of the rubies
the rich green of the emerald
and the soft white of the pearls. A classic and auspicious South Indian color palette.
occasions: traditional ceremonies like Seemantham or Half-Saree functions
and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for sophisticated evening events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Grand Haaram embodies traditional South Indian elegance with a modern touch. The floral design and gemstone combinations are timeless, signifying prosperity and good fortune. The exceptional craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure this piece will be treasured for generations. Own a piece of Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage.
